entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
